title: Elegant Duplex with Modern Comforts & Historic Surroundings in Rynek, Kazimierz Dolny
description: Embrace refined living in this luxurious 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom duplex nestled within the iconic Rynek neighborhood of Kazimierz Dolny. Spanning 156 sqm, this elegantly designed residence combines contemporary features with the charm of a storied architectural heritage. Natural light abounds, illuminating spacious living zones characterized by quality finishes and neutral tones, while thoughtful amenities make every moment effortless. The expansive private driveway boasts underfloor heating for year-round convenience, and eco-conscious solutions such as solar panels enhance both comfort and energy savings. Wheelchair accessibility throughout ensures step-free enjoyment for every family member and guest.
neighborhood_description: Enjoy the perfect blend of modern development and old-world appeal, with Rynek’s picturesque squares surrounded by both preserved historic townhouses and newly developed homes. Located near verdant parks and whimsical playgrounds, the neighborhood offers a quiet retreat alongside vibrant cultural landmarks and quaint cafés. Excellent highway access places this tranquil luxury home just a comfortable drive away from city centers and weekend escapes.
key_features: fully wheelchair accessible interior and entry
lifestyle_benefits: quiet low-traffic street ideal for walking pets
target_buyer: Discerning homeowners seeking luxury comfort and modern sustainability, especially those prioritizing pet-friendly features, accessibility, and easy highway connections. Ideal for families or couples wanting space to work from home and entertain without sacrificing tranquility.
market_positioning: A rare, premium duplex amongst modern and historical neighbors, offering advanced amenities in one of Kazimierz Dolny’s most valued cultural locations. Perfectly blends contemporary convenience and classic allure—delivering notable value elevating it above most local offerings.
